nodes.text: "Betrayal at Bespin" is a short story written by Michael Siglain and illustrated by Brian Rood that partially adapts Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back. It was published on September 1, 2015 by Disney–Lucasfilm Press in the anthology The Original Trilogy Stories. It adapts Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back from the Millennium Falcon's escape from Hoth to Boba Fett's departure from Bespin.
